alcohol.name: Three pints challenge
alcohol.description: Go to a pub/bar and drink 3 pints/cocktails within an hour

alcohol.name: Taste your poison
alcohol.description: Attend a wine, beer or whisky tasting

alcohol.name: Crawl home challenge
alcohol.description: Go on a pub or bar crawl with at least six locations

alcohol.name: Spirited night
alcohol.description: Have a shot of at least five unique spirits in one night

alcohol.name: Alphabetic drinker
alcohol.description: Have a drink for 5 consecutive letters of the alphabet (Aperol spritz, Buck's fizz, etc.)

alcohol.name: Power hour
alcohol.description: Drink a shot of beer every minute for an hour

alcohol.name: Brewery visit
alcohol.description: Visit a brewery or a distillery

alcohol.name: Pinterest warrior
alcohol.description: Make a cocktail from Pinterest and see if it tastes as good as it looks

alcohol.name: split the G'
alcohol.description: Order a Guinness and 'split the G' first try

alcohol.name: Alcohol-free, TWICE
alcohol.description: Drink every drink mentioned in 'Alcohol-Free' by TWICE in one night (champagne, wine, tequila, margarita, mojito, mimosa and pi√±a colada)

alcohol.name: wakey wakey, time for a shot
alcohol.description: Get drunk before noon on a weekday
